channel.title: ExemptionX 639 - Economy+PK Server
channel.description:
[B][CENTER][url=http://exemptionx.net/download/][img]http://exemptionx.net/forum/images/styles/ambient-lightingv4/images/ex3.png[/img][/url]
[URL=http://exemptionx.net/download]Download[/URL] [URL=http://exemptionx.net/]Homepage[/URL] [URL=http://exemptionx.net/home/]Forums[/URL][/CENTER]
[CENTER][B]Welcome to ExemptionX. We are a new server with great potential. If you like economy-pk servers, this is the server for you. We strive to make updates every week and we have a friendly and active playerbase. Our server focuses on PKing such as Safe PK with drops & Risk PKing. At Safe PK you can receive rare drops and obtain anything from a Rune crossbow to Dragon Claws and Godswords. Another thing about ExemptionX is that we don't use coins currency, our currency is strictly tokkul! You can spend tokkuls at Joe's Tokkul Shop. We also have great features like Clan Chat, Summoning, Dicing, Staking/Dueling, and much more.
We have an uptime of 99.9% and we are hosted on a dedicated server with great speculations. So don't wait, join now! You won't regret it...
Pictures: [IMG]http://exemptionx.net/pics/gedrops.png[/img] [IMG]http://exemptionx.net/pics/duelscreen.png[/img] [IMG]http://exemptionx.net/pics/winduel.png[/img] [IMG]http://exemptionx.net/pics/ex1.png[/img] [IMG]http://exemptionx.net/pics/gepk.png[/img] [IMG]http://exemptionx.net/pics/tokkulshop.png[/img] [IMG]http://exemptionx.net/pics/mbpk.png[/img] [IMG]http://exemptionx.net/pics/pkscores.png[/img]
Old Pic: [IMG]http://exemptionx.net/258.jpg[/img][/b][/center]
